official_title: A resolution to disapprove energy action numbered 4, an executive branch proposal to exempt aviation gasoline and kerosene-base jet fuel from mandatory petroleum price regulations.

summary.text: Disapproves energy action 4, an executive branch proposal to exempt aviation gasoline and kerosene-base jet fuel from mandatory petroleum price regulations.
